channel.title: Fun Vbs scripts
channel.description:
Well ive been looking at some .vbs scripts on a hacking forum and this one is very fun ^.^
First create a text file and paste the following into it
[code]Set wshShell =wscript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell") do wscript.sleep 100 wshshell.sendkeys "{CAPSLOCK}" wshshell.sendkeys "{NUMLOCK}" wshshell.sendkeys "{SCROLLLOCK}" loop [/code]
And save it as [anything here].vbs
Start it up and watch the magic happen!
Also, to stop it you will need to end the process via task manager
Does anyone here have any other cool .vbs files they want to share?

item.title: Fun Vbs scripts
item.dc:creator: @Wildyscape562 Wildyscape562
item.description:
@Wildyscape562 wrote:

[code]set shellobj = CreateObject(“WScript.Shell”)
shellobj.run “cmd”

do

shellobj.sendkeys “Y”
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "o "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys " "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "W "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "a "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "t "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "s "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys " "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "U "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "p "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys " "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "M "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "o "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "p "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "a "
wscript.sleep 200
Shellobj.sendkeys "r "
loop
[/code]

little cmd typing command i made

Read full topic
